name: nuxeo-website-styles
description: Styles to be used on Nuxeo websites

engines.browsers: > 0.5%, last 2 versions, Firefox ESR, not dead

scripts.start: npm run build:components && npm run compile
scripts.dev: npm run server & nodemon --exec 'npm run compile && browser-sync reload'
scripts.xpostcompile: rm -rf static/satellite/latest && mkdir -p static/satellite/latest && cp -r build/es5-bundled/* static/satellite/latest && cp -r css static/satellite/latest
scripts.xcompile:styles: sass --embed-sources --load-path scss/ --load-path SMAKK/sass/ --load-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss/ --style compressed scss/:tmp/
scripts.npm_install: [ `npm run -s package_checksum` = `cat package.md5` ] || npm install && npm run -s package_checksum > package.md5
scripts.xversion: npm run npm_install && npm start && cp -r static/satellite/latest static/satellite/`node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version);"` && git add static/satellite && git commit -m "Satellite release `node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version);"` added"

author: Andrew Goodricke <github@andrewgoodricke.com> (http://www.nuxeo.com)
